ack.title: Acknowledgment
ack.p: This study was derived from a research project approved by the research and technology deputy of Hamadan University of Medical Sciences (project 9405132558). Hereby, we gratefully thank this deputy and Dr Kavyani, Dr Malekifar, Dr Janahmad, Dr Lotfi, Dr Basirinia, Kobra Heidarzadi, Javad Shekarchi, Masoomeh Jalilian, Atefeh Morshedi, Mansour Amraei, and all people who helped us conduct it.
